import React, { useState } from 'react' import logo from '../img/logo.svg'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faBars } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; export default function Header() { const navBar = () =>{ const [showMobileMenu, setShowMobileMenu] = useState (false); return (
  • Home

setShowMobileMenu(!showMobileMenu)} icon={faBars} className=' pl-2 text-primary text-3xl cursor-pointer'>
  • Home

) } }
